content.content: 001-Section 6.01(b) & (c)(i) - Borrower Compliance Certificate - Q4 2022 - conformed1920×2488 166 KB   001-Section 6.01(c)(ii) - Borrower Compliance Certificate - Q4 2022 - conformed1920×2485 217 KB   002-Section 6.01(c)(ii) - Borrower Compliance Certificate - Q4 2022 - conformed 22550×3300 128 KB   003-Section 6.01(c)(ii) - Borrower Compliance Certificate - Q4 2022 - conformed 32550×3300 432 KB   004-Section 6.01(c)(ii) - Borrower Compliance Certificate - Q4 2022 - conformed 42550×3300 308 KB  There were no loans outstanding against the credit facility on 31 December 2022. 6s Capital started to use the credit facility again in January 2023.
